ftbquests.chapter.chapter_x_applied_ener: Chapter X: Applied Energetics 2[--X章:应用电源2--]
Explore the moon[--探索月球--]
This items can be found in &ldungeons chests on the moon&r.[--这些物品可以在&ldungeons箱子中找到&r.--]
The &8sky stone block&r can be duplicated once obtained one.[--&8天空石块&r在获得后可以复制.--]
It's time to start making some &eProcessors&f. These are an important crafting ingredient used to make the large majority of ME-connected devices.[--是时候开始制作一些&e处理器&f了。这些是制作大多数ME连接设备的重要合成材料.--]
Virtual Storage System[--虚拟存储系统--]
&lWelcome to &bApplied Energistics 2&f![--&l欢迎来到&b应用能源2&f!--]

Applied Energistics 2 (or &oAE2&r for short) is an incredibly versatile &bdigital storage&f mod, allowing for extremely efficient storage and all sorts of automation capabilities to greatly augment your modded Minecraft experience from as early as you want to the very endgame.[--应用能源2 (或者&oAE2&r 短) 是一个非常多功能的&b数字存储&fmod,允许非常高效的存储和各种自动化能力,从你想开始到最末地游戏,极大地扩展你的modd Minecraft经验.--]
Click to Acknowledge[--点击确认--]
Does exactly what you'd expect.[--与你所希望的完全一样。--]

The &bQuartz Wrench&f does what any regular tech mod wrench would do. It rotates blocks and devices along the face you right-click on and dismantles them when right-clicked while sneaking.[--&b石英扳手&f可以像任何普通科技模组扳手一样工作。它会旋转你右键单击的面部的方块和装置,并在潜行右键单击时拆除它们。--]
AE2's wrench comes in both certus and nether quartz flavours.[--AE2的扳手有赛特斯和下界石英的味道.--]
Quartz Wrench[--石英扳手--]
Plug in[--插上--]
While the Charger will natively accept RF/FE, the vast majority of an ME network uses its own dedicated power system called AE.[--充能器将自定义接受RF/FE,但大多数ME网络使用自己的专用电力系统AE.--]

RF/FE can be converted into the native AE at a ratio of 2:1 RF:AE, either directly through an ME Controller, or through the &bEnergy Acceptor&f, which can instead be connected to any part of the network.[--RF/FE可以直接通过ME控制器或&b能源接收器&f以2:1RF:AE的比例转换为本地AE,它可以连接到网络的任何部分.--]

By default, an ME network on its own only has an internal buffer of 800AE without an ME Controller, with the controller adding an extra 8kAE per block. For large enough networks, this can be insufficient and may cause a network to power off intermittently when trying to recoup power for any connected devices.[--默认情况下,ME网络自己只有800AE的内部缓冲,没有ME控制器,控制器每个方块增加8kAE。对于足够大的网络,这可能不够,并且可能导致网络在试图为任何连接的设备恢复电源时断断断续续断电。--]

The &bEnergy Cell&f allows for an ME network to hold significantly more energy, adding another 200kAE per regular Energy Cell and 1.6MAE per &bDense&f Energy Cell. These can also be placed anywhere in the network to provide the increased energy buffer.[--&b能量单元&f允许ME网络容纳更多的能量,每个普通能量单元增加200kAE,每个&b致密&f能量单元增加1.6MAE。这些也可以放置在网络任何地方以提供增加的能量缓冲。--]

The &bEnergy Card&f can be applied to most chargeable devices like Portable Cells and Wireless Terminals (covered later) to also increase &otheir&r energy buffer.[--&b能量卡&f可以应用于大多数可充电的设备,如便携式元件和无线终端(稍后覆盖),以增加&o他们&r的能量缓冲。--]
Quantum Network Bridge[--量子网络桥--]
The &bQuantum Entangled Singularities&f are used to link together a ring-shaped device known as a &eQuantum Network Bridge&f.[--&b量子纠缠奇点&f用于连接一个环形设备,名为&e量子网络桥&f.--]

When two of these individual rings have been linked using the Quantum Entangled Singularities and jumpstarted with some AE power, an ME network can be expanded wirelessly on the other side of the bridge, across either long distances or even dimensions.[--当这些单个环使用量子纠缠奇点连接起来并用一些AE电力启动时,ME网络可以在桥的对面无线扩展,可以长距离甚至维度。--]
Hyper-Condensed Matter[--超凝聚物质--]
Not quite antimatter[--不太反物质--]

When using a 64k storage component or higher, the Matter Condenser becomes able to condense significantly more to produce a &bSingularity&f. A single singularity requires 256000 items to be voided. That's exactly &o4000 stacks&r![--当使用64k存储组件或更高时,物质冷凝器可以大量压缩以产生&b奇点&f.单个奇点需要256000个物品消失.这完全就是&o4000组物品&r!--]

See what happens when you throw this singularity on the ground with a piece of &eender dust&f. You'll have to deal some damage to the surroundings while you're at it, but thankfully AE2 offers its own &bTiny TNT&f to minimise that.[--当你用&e末影尘土&f将这个奇点扔在地上时会变成什么样。当你在地上的时候,你必须给周围环境造成一些伤害,但幸运的是AE2提供了它自己的&bTiny TNT&f来最小化它.--]
Fluix Crystal[--福鲁伊克斯水晶--]

Arguably the most important resource you will need next is &eFluix&f, used throughout the vast majority of AE2 devices and serving as a base for crafting all of the cabling within an ME network.[--可以说,你下一个需要最重要的资源是&e福鲁伊克斯&f,它用于大多数AE2设备,并且作为ME网络中制作所有线缆的基础.--]
Basic Cabling[--基础线缆--]

To connect the vast majority of your ME network together, you will need some cable. &eME Glass Cable&f is the first and most basic kind of cable, and you'll be making this all throughout as the first step towards crafting the other kinds of cable.[--要将ME网络的绝大多数连接在一起,你需要一些线缆。&eME玻璃线缆&f是第一种也是最基础的线缆,你将在制作其他种类的线缆过程中始终制作这个。--]

Both glass cables and their &ecovered&f counterpart can carry up to 8 channels along a single section of cabling. Unlike glass cables, covered cables can subsequently be crafted into &edense&f covered cables, capable of carrying up to 32 channels. However, most \"multipart\" devices such as buses and terminals cannot be directly attached to dense cables, requiring normal-width cables to form a connection instead.[--玻璃线缆及其&e覆盖的&f对口线缆可以沿单个部分的线缆携带多达8个通道。与玻璃线缆不同,覆盖的线缆之后可以制作为&e致密&f包层线缆,可以携带多达32个通道。然而,大多数“多方块”的设备,例如总线和终端不能直接连接到密闭线缆上,需要普通宽线缆才能形成连接。--]

All cables can also be crafted with dye to colour them. Uncoloured (\"Fluix\") cables can connect to any other colour of cable, but otherwise differently-coloured cables will never connect to one another.[--所有线缆都可以用染料制作来给它们染色。未着色的(Fluix)线缆可以连接到任何其他颜色的线缆上,否则不同颜色的线缆永远不会相互连接.--]

In Applied Energistics 2, every ME network has a certain number of &echannels&f available, which simply means how many networked devices can fit on the whole network.[--在应用能源2中,每个ME网络都有一定数量的&e通道&f可用,这意味着整个网络可以装配多少网络设备.--]

As a rule of thumb, any device that more or less handles ME data directly (items stored within the network) and carries out some form of I/O will take up a channel. Usually components that are only concerned with the internal power storage of the network, like &eEnergy Cells&f do &onot&r take up channels.[--根据经验法则,任何设备如果或多或少地直接处理ME数据(存储在网络中的物品)并执行某种I/O,都会占用一个频道。通常情况下,组件只与网络的内部电力存储有关,例如&e能量单元&f做&onot&r拿起通道.--]
Glass Cable[--玻璃线缆--]
Covered Cable[--包层线缆--]
Dense Covered Cable[--致密包层线缆--]
The last piece of the puzzle for any large ME network is the &bME Controller&f.[--任意大型ME网络的最后一个拼图是&bME控制器&f.--]

A controller supplies an ME Network with a far larger number of channels than the standard 8 channels for ad-hoc networks, providing 32 channels out of each face of the block for a total of 216 channels.[--控制器为ME网络提供比标准8个通道更多的通道,从方块每个面提供32个通道,共216个通道。--]

That's only for a single-block controller, however, since the ME Controller is in fact a multi-block structure. The controller can be up to 7x7x7 blocks in size and can come in any freeform arrangement within that maximum size. Each individual block can then provide its own separate set of channels, so long as no single controller block is surrounded by 4 other blocks along the same plane.[--然而,这只用于单个方块控制器,因为ME控制器事实上是一个多方块结构。控制器最多可以有7x7x7个方块大小,并且可以在最大尺寸范围内做出任何自由成型。然后每个单个方块都可以提供自己的一套通道,只要没有单个控制器块被同一平面上的4个其他方块包围。--]

An ME Network may only contain one multiblock controller at any given time. Attempting to connect more than one controller on separate parts of the network will cause a conflict, shutting down the whole network.[--ME网络在任何特定时间只能包含一个多方块控制器。试图在网络的不同部分连接多个控制器会导致冲突,关闭整个网络。--]
Cable Anchor[--线缆锚--]
Under the knife[--刀下方--]
The &bQuartz Cutting Knife&f, like the wrench, comes in both nether and certus quartz flavours and is a useful crafting tool to have on hand.[--&b石英切割刀&f像扳手一样,具有下界和赛特斯石英的味道,是一种有用的制作工具。--]

Cables can also be separated without needing to be coloured by attaching a &bCable Anchor&f between them, crafted using this knife and craftable up to 50 times with the same knife before it breaks.[--线缆也可以通过在线缆之间安装&b线缆锚&f,使用这把刀制作,在它破坏之前最多可以用同一把刀制作50次来将线缆分开.--]

Cable Anchors can also be used to craft &bCable Facades&f, allowing you to disguise cables within walls by covering them with the face of an arbitrary block. While facade recipes are hidden in JEI, you can still craft them by taking any regular block and surrounding it with 4 cable anchors in the crafting grid.[--线缆锚也可以用来制作&b线缆Facades&f,允许你用任意方块表面覆盖线缆来伪装墙上的线缆。虽然墙壁配方隐藏在JEI中,你仍然可以通过在合成终端中拿下任何普通方块并用4个线缆锚来制作它们.--]
Quartz Cutting Knife[--石英切割刀--]
Advanced Cabling[--高级线缆--]

The &bME Smart Cable&f and &bDense Smart Cable&f function identically to the covered cables in terms of channel distribution, but will also visibly display the amount of channels they are using as coloured lines along themselves.[--在频道分配方面,&bME智能线缆&f和&b致密线缆&f的功能与覆盖的线缆相同,但也会直接显示它们作为彩色线缆使用的频道数量.--]
Smart Cable[--智能线缆--]
Dense Smart Cable[--致密智能线缆--]
Color Applicator[--颜色应用器--]

The &bColor Applicator&f is a chargeable tool that allows for in-world dyeing of cables. It functions more or less as a specialised &estorage cell&f to be loaded up with either vanilla dyes or &epaint balls&f for specific colours, along with &esnowballs&f to wash colours off and turn cables back to their Fluix variant.[--&b聚变器&f是一种可充电的工具,允许在世界中染色线缆。它或多或少地像一个特殊的&e存储单元&f一样,为特定颜色加载原版染料或&epaint球&f,同时&es雪球&f可以洗掉彩色并将线缆转回其福鲁伊克斯变体.--]
Applying colour to a cable uses 100AE of energy from its internal battery, for a total of 3400 cable segments in a single charge.[--对线缆应用颜色使用内部电池的100AE能量,一次充电共3400个线缆段。--]
Condensed Matter[--凝聚物质--]
As for wirelessly expanding the ME Network itself, the first step is admittedly somewhat unorthodox.[--关于无线扩展ME网络本身,第一个步骤可以说有些不正则。--]

The &bMatter Condenser&f is AE2's take on a trash can, voiding any items inserted into it. When fitted with a &eStorage Component&f, however, the condenser can harness some left-over energy from the item being voided and store it to make two special crafting items out of enough concentrated energy.[--&b物质冷凝器&f是AE2拿起一个垃圾桶,将输入它的任何物品销毁。然而,当安装了&e存储组件&f时,冷凝器可以从被虚空的物品中提取一些剩余能量并存储它,用足够浓缩的能量制作两个特殊制作物品。--]
The first of these two items is the &bMatter Ball&f, requiring at least a 1k storage component and 256 items' worth of voided material.[--第一个是&b物质球&f,至少需要1k存储元件和256个物品价值的无效材料.--]
The Storage[--存储--]
Items as a file system[--作为文件系统的物品--]

Arguably the most important aspect of Applied Energistics 2 is its storage system, making use of digital &eStorage Cells&f. These cells are accessible through either an &eME Chest&r for single cells, or an &eME Drive&r for multiple cells.[--可以说,应用能源2最重要的方面是它的存储系统,它使用数字&e存储元件&f。这些元件可以通过单个元件的&eME箱子&r或多个元件的&eME驱动器&r来访问.--]

The &bME Chest&f holds a single Cell at a time, which can then be read from and written to from any other terminal on the same network. The ME Chest itself also provides its own terminal screen on the top with specific access only to the cell it contains.[--&bME箱子&f一次可容纳一个单元,然后可以从同一个网络上的任何终端中读取并写入。ME箱子本身也可以在顶部提供它自己的终端屏幕,只有它包含的单元有特定的访问权限。--]

The &bME Drive&f can hold up to 10 assorted Storage Cells in the space of a single block and a single ME channel. However, it does not provide its own terminal screen, requiring some external terminal elsewhere on the network for storage access.[--&bME驱动器&f可以在单个方块和单个ME通道的空间中存储多达10个不同存储元件。然而,它不提供自己的终端屏幕,需要网络上其他地方的一些外部终端才能存储。--]
Defragmentation[--降级--]

The &bME IO Port&f allows for the contents of an ME network's storage to be quickly rearranged between different storage media such as ME cells and external containers connected to storage buses.[--&bMEIO端口&f允许在ME单元和连接到存储总线的外部容器等不同的存储介质之间快速重新配置ME网络的存储内容.--]

When a cell is inserted in an input slot on the left, the IO Port can be toggled to either empty the cell out into other ME storages or fill the (ideally, partitioned) cell with certain items spread out across other storages.[--当一个单元插入左侧输入槽时,IO端口可以切换成将单元清空到其他ME存储器中,或者将某些物品分流到其他存储器中。--]

The &bCell Workbench&f allows for cells to be \"partitioned\" to hold specific items, i.e. given a whitelist filter. It also allows the cell to be upgraded with certain upgrade cards such as the Inverter Card, which sets the aforementioned whitelist to be a blacklist instead.[--&b细胞工作台&f允许“分流”存储特定物品,即给它一个白名单过滤器。它也允许用某些升级卡(例如反向卡)升级单元,该卡将前述白名单设置为黑名单。--]

Cells can also be given a higher or lower \"priority\" via the workbench, i.e. allow the cell to be the first to receive certain items until full, or made to wait for other higher-priority cells to fill up first.[--元件也可以通过工作台得到更高或更低的“优先级”,即允许元件第一个接收到某些物品,直到满,或等待其他更优先级的元件先填充.--]

The &bOverflow Destruction Card&f is a cell upgrade that allows storage cells to delete (void) any items of a type already contained within them, when try to move into the cell and the cell is already full.[--&b反转销毁卡&f是一个单元升级,允许存储元件删除(避免)其中已经包含的任何种类的物品,当尝试移动到元件中时,并且电池已经满了.--]
ME Storage &mCells&r Drawers[--ME存储&m单元&r抽屉--]

The &bEqual Distribution Card&f is an upgrade for storage cells that pre-allocates a certain amount of items that can be taken up by any individual type.[--&b等价分配卡&f是存储元件的升级,可以预分配一定数量的物品,任何单个类型都可以使用.--]

This behaviour is comparable to something like a Functional Storage drawer, wherein each compartment holds a set number of stacks as opposed to allowing items from one compartment to leak into the others and crowd other kinds of items out.[--该行为类似于功能性存储抽屉,其中每个抽屉都装有一定数量的堆叠,而不是允许从一个隔板中流出物品,并将其他种类的物品挤出.--]
Auto-Crafting[--自动合成--]
Order up[--秩序升级--]

Storage is nice and all that, but what good is a storage system if it's clogged up with raw materials needing to be crafted and processed into something and you're still stuck with having to do so manually?[--存储是不错的,所有的,但是如果一个存储系统被需要制作和处理的原料阻挡,并且你仍然需要手动这样做,那它有什么用?--]

AE2's &eauto-crafting&f system begins with the &bME Pattern Provider&f. The Pattern Provider holds certain items called &bPatterns&f (covered in the next quest) which are programmed to hold some recipe that turns input items into a certain output. Up to 9 patterns can fit in one provider.[--AE2的&eeato-craft&f系统从&bME样板供应器&f开始。样板供应器容纳某些名为&b粉末&f的物品(在下一个任务中包含),这些物品被编程为一些将输入物品转化为特定输出的配方。最多9个样板可以安装在同一个供应器中.--]

You'll often be making use of multiple pattern providers scattered all throughout your base, which is why it's useful to have a &bPattern Access Terminal&f to remotely access the contents of any and all providers on your wider ME network.[--你经常会使用分散在你的基地里的多个样板供应器,所以需要一个&b花纹访问终端&f来远程访问你更大的ME网络上的任何和所有供应器的内容。--]
ME Pattern Provider[--ME样板供应器--]
Patterns[--样板--]

&bPatterns&f are what hold an encoded recipe to be fulfilled by a Pattern Provider. To encode a recipe onto a Pattern, the &bME Pattern Encoding Terminal&f must be used.[--&b粉末&f是一个由样板供应器完成的编码配方。要将配方编码到样板上,必须使用&bME样板编码终端&f.--]

Patterns can be set to hold either a regular &ecrafting&f recipe, which will require the use of a &eMolecular Assembler&f on the face of its Provider, or a more general \"&eprocessing&f\" recipe, wherein any input items can be sent out by the provider into some other machine block or specialised processing plant.[--样板可以设置为保留一个普通的&e合成&f配方,这将需要在供应器表面使用&e分子装配台&f,或者一个更通用的“&e处理&f”配方,其中任何输入物品都可以由供应方发送到其他机器方块或特殊处理厂.--]
The &bMolecular Assembler&f is AE2's equivalent of an automatic crafting table, required to fulfil any and all &ecrafting&f pattern jobs.[--&b分子装配台&f相当于AE2的自动制作台,是完成任何&e制作&f样板任务所需的.--]

Molecular Assemblers are capable of transferring power and channels to other ME devices connected to it, but will not themselves take up a channel. Up to 6 MAs can be connected to a single Pattern Provider (if employed) to allow for more crafts to be done in parallel.[--分子装配机可以将电力和通道传输到连接到它的其他ME设备上,但自己不会使用通道。最多可以将6个MAS连接到单个样板供应器(如果使用的话),以允许并行完成更多的工艺。--]

MAs also each have their own dedicated slot for a single crafting pattern, allowing them to function standalone when powered. When operated in this way, any matching items inserted into the MA will be automatically crafted into the result of the pattern.[--MAS每个都有自己的专用插槽,用于制作单个合成样板,允许它们独立工作。当以这种方式操作时,任何输入MAS的匹配物品都会自动制作成该样板的结果.--]

The &bAcceleration Card&f, depending on the device being upgraded with it, will either increase the speed at which the device operates or allow the device to carry out more operations in one go.[--&b加速卡&f取决于正在用它升级的设备,它将提高设备操作的速度或允许设备一次性执行更多的操作.--]

In the case of the &eMolecular Assembler&f, a full set of 5 cards reduces the time taken for the MA to fulfil a craft from one second (with no cards) to one &otick&r.[--在&e分子装配台&f的情况下,全套的5张卡片将完成合成所需的时间从1秒(无卡片)减为1秒&tick&r.--]

The &bME Level Emitter&f, when configured with a specific item and quantity of it to respond to, will emit a redstone signal depending on whether that item stored in the network either falls below, goes above or equals the given quantity.[--当&bME级发射器&f被配置为特定物品和数量来响应时,它将发出红石信号,取决于存储在网络中的物品是否低于、高于或等于给定数量.--]

This can be used, for example, to automatically switch certain machines on with redstone to auto-craft a resource when it falls below a given minimum amount.[--例如,它可用于自动切换某些机器的红石,当它低于给定的最小数量时自动制作资源。--]
Redstone-Controlled ME[--红石控制ME--]

Individual ME devices can also be configured to respond to redstone signals. When upgraded with a &bRedstone Card&f, a device can be configured to do work only when powered with redstone or otherwise as needed.[--单个ME设备也可以被配置为对红石信号做出响应。当用&b红石卡&f升级时,一个设备只能根据需要使用红石或者其他方式进行配置。--]

This behavour can also apply to entire &osections&r of an ME network by using an &bME Toggle Bus&f. This allows a section of the network on the other side of the bus to come online only when the bus is powered by redstone, or to go offline if using an &einverted&f toggle bus.[--这个Behforage也可以通过使用&bMETggle总线&f来应用于ME网络的所有&osections&r.这允许总线另一侧的网络部分在总线用红石充电时上线,或者在使用&e反转&f切换总线时去离线.--]
Automation in upgrade form![--升级中的自动化!--]

When applied as an upgrade to any supported device such as an Interface or Export Bus, the &bCrafting Card&f allows the device in question to automatically send out its own crafting requests for a required (filtered) item. Crafting CPUs can be set to respond only to these requests to prevent taking up CPUs meant for player-requested crafts.[--当作为升级应用于任何支持的设备时,例如接口或导出总线,&b合成卡&f允许该设备自动发送自己对所需(过滤)物品的制作请求。合成CPU可以设置为只响应这些请求,防止占用玩家请求合成的CPU.--]

When the &eLevel Emitter&f is upgraded with the Crafting Card, it can be configured to emit redstone in order to directly facilitate in crafting, by emitting a signal either &owhile&r a crafting job for its given item is detected or specifically &oto&r craft the item. The latter would apply for cases where the only thing needed to make a given item is a redstone signal, without even requiring a crafting pattern.[--当&e高级发射器&f用合成卡升级时,它可以配置为发送红石以直接帮助制作,方法是通过发送信号(&o)&r为其给定物品的制作工作被检测到,或特别&oto&r制作物品。对于制作给定物品所需的唯一东西是红石信号,甚至不需要合成图案的情况,后者将适用。--]
Download more RAM[--下载更多内存--]

Before you can carry out an auto-crafting job, you need a device to actually store the request itself along with any interim items for multi-step crafts. This device is known as a &ecrafting CPU&f.[--在你能够执行自动合成之前,你需要一个设备来实际存储请求本身和任何跨步合成的中间物品。这个设备被称为&e合成CPU&f.--]

A crafting CPU is a multiblock structure requiring at least one &bCrafting Storage&f block, optionally along with any other Crafting Unit. The multiblock can be made in any size, but must be a solid cuboid in order to form and function accordingly.[--合成CPU是一个多方块结构,至少需要一个&b合成存储&f方块,可以与任何其他合成单元一起选择。多方块可以任意尺寸制成,但必须是一个固体幼体,才能相对地成型和工作.--]
Crafting Storage[--合成存储--]
Download more CPU cores[--下载更多CPU核心--]

The &bCrafting Co-Processing Unit&f helps speed up crafting jobs by allowing pattern providers to either send items out to their connected devices faster or to work concurrently to make multiple required ingredients.[--&b合成处理单元&f通过允许样板供应器更快地将物品发送到其连接的设备中或同时工作以制作多种所需的材料来帮助加速制作工作。--]
The base AE2 co-processor provides one co-processor \"thread\".[--基础AE2联动处理器提供1个联动处理器“线程”。--]
Crafting Co-Processor[--合成并行处理器--]
Download more VRAM[--下载更多VRAM--]
The &bCrafting Monitor&f displays the overall item being crafted, along with the remaining quantity of that item still being crafted.[--&b合成监控器&f展示了正在制作的总物品,以及该物品的剩余数量。--]
Both the base AE2 monitor and the MEGA monitor function identically, but are provided for aesthetic purposes.[--基础AE2监控器和MEGA监控器功能相同,但用于美学用途。--]
Crafting Monitor[--合成监控器--]
Creating your first Storage Cell[--制作你的第一个存储元件--]
The first kilobyte.[--第一个千字节。--]
Each individual cell has a certain capacity dictated by the &ecomponent&f that the cell has been crafted with.[--每个元件都有一定的容量,由单元制作的&e组件&f决定.--]
The first of the components is the &b1k ME Storage Component&f, providing &e1024&f \"bytes\" of storage for a given cell.[--第一个组件是&b1kME存储组件&f,为给定单元提供&e1024&f“字节”存储.--]
The last component 256k, provides &e262144&f bytes of storage.[--最后的组件256k,提供&e262144&f字节的存储.--]
Item Storage[--物品存储--]

With the 1k Storage Component, you can now craft yourself a 1k ME Item Storage Cell to start your digital item storage system. You'll most likely want the majority of your storage to be for items, so you'll probably want to make a few &bME Item Storage Cells&f.[--使用1k存储组件,你现在可以自己制作一个1kME物品存储元件来启动您的数字存储系统。你最可能希望你的存储中大多数是物品,所以你可能想要制作一些&bME物品存储元件&f.--]

ME Item Storage Cells can each hold up to 63 different types of items. Each new type of item added to a cell will take up a certain fraction of the storage cell's total capacity in bytes. For each type already present, 1 \"byte\" counts for 8 items of that same type.[--ME物品存储元件可以容纳多达63种不同种类的物品。添加到单元中的每一种新类型的物品将占用存储元件总容量的一定部分。对于已经存在的每一种,1个“字节”为8个相同类型的物品。--]
As an example, a 1k Item Storage Cell containing only cobblestone can hold up to 8128 cobblestone (8*1024b - 8b/type * 1 type).[--例如,一个1k个仅包含圆石的物品存储元件可以容纳多达8128个圆石(8*1024b - 8b/type * 1 type).--]

If a cell is empty, it can be repurposed by disassembling it into its respective component and housing. This is done by sneaking and right-clicking in the air with the cell in your hand.[--如果一个单元是空的,可以通过将其分解成其不同的组件和外壳来重新使用。这是通过潜行和右键单击空中手持的单元来完成的。--]
ME Item Storage Cell[--ME物品存储元件--]
Fluid Storage[--流体存储--]

Items are not the only things that can be stored in ME cells. &bME Fluid Storage Cells&f can store liquids such as water, lava and any variety of modded oils and fuels, just to give a few examples.[--&bME流体存储元件&f可以存储液体,如水、熔岩和任意种类的油和燃料,仅举几个例子.--]

Note that all storage cells, regardless of what they're designed to store, only differ in terms of their housing; both item and fluid cells use the same kind of storage component to make.[--注意,所有存储元件,不管它们设计了什么,它们的容量不同;物品和流体元件使用相同的存储元件来制作.--]
For fluids, 1 byte equals 8 buckets (8000mb).[--对于流体,1字节等于8桶(8000mb)。--]
ME Fluid Storage Cell[--ME流体存储元件--]
&bPortable Cells&f function identically to regular cells in that they can they be inserted into a chest or drive and filled accordingly.[--&b便携式元件&f的功能与普通元件相同,因为它们可以插入箱子或驱动器中并相应填充.--]

However, unlike regular cells, their contents can also be accessed standalone via the cell item itself, a bit like a digital ME-flavoured backpack.[--然而,与普通单元不同,它们的内容也可以通过单元物品本身独立访问,有点像ME-forforded背包.--]
ME Portable Cell[--ME便携元件--]

The next thing to make to allow for wireless network access is the &bME Wireless Access Point&f. The Access Point is used to open the network to wireless access via a &ewireless terminal&f, and has a set (finite) range depending on how many &bWireless Boosters&f are inserted into the access point.[--接下来是&bME无线接入点&f。访问点用于通过&e无线终端&f打开网络无线访问,并且具有一个取决于&b无线推进器&f插入访问点的套装(无限)范围.--]
This is what you're here for[--这就是你在这里的目的--]
The &bWireless Terminal&f functions identically to a regular terminal, but wirelessly.[--&b无线终端&f的功能与普通终端相同,但无线。--]

Before it can be used to access a network, it must first be &elinked&f to the network by placing it into the top-right slot of the &eWireless Access Point&r. If it is not linked to a network, or is out of either range or power, the terminal will not function.[--在它可用于访问网络之前,它必须先通过将其放入&e无线访问点&r的右上插槽&e连接&f到网络。如果它没有连接到网络,或超出范围或功率,终端将不工作。--]
Wireless terminals can also be upgraded with &eEnergy Cards&f to provide a larger internal battery.[--无线终端也可以使用&e能量卡&f升级,以提供更大的内部电池.--]
Spatial IO[--空间IO--]

Aside from the storage of items and fluids, AE2 also provides a native way of storing entire &estructures&f inside of storage cells, not too dissimilarly to the Compact Machines mod.[--除了存储物品和流体外,AE2还提供了一种在存储元件中存储整个&e结构&f的本地方法,与压缩机器mod类似。--]

The &bSpatial IO Port&f allows structures contained within a &bSpatial Containment Structure&f to be captured within a specially-designed storage cell, activated via a redstone signal.[--&b空间IO端口&f允许将&b空间内存结构&f中的结构捕获到特殊制作的存储元件中,通过红石信号激活.--]

If a mob or player happens to stand inside of the SCS while the space is being captured, they too will be transported to where the rest of the space goes, i.e. in a dedicated dimension. Just make sure you have a way to get back out and in if you're the one being captured.[--如果怪物或玩家在空间被捕获时碰巧站在SCS内部,它们也会被传送到空间的其他部分,即一个专用维度中。只需确保你有一个返回的方法,如果你是被捕获的。--]
Spatial Pylon[--空间塔--]

The Spatial Containment Structure (SCS) consists of a cage of &bSpatial Pylons&f covering the volume you wish to enclose in a Spatial IO cell. At the absolute minimum, an SCS requires three lines of spatial pylon blocks, one for each dimension of the space being contained (length, width, height).[--空间控制结构(SCS)包含一个&b空间塔&f的笼子,覆盖了您想要插入的空间IO单元的体积。在绝对最小范围内,SCS需要三行空间塔块,每个空间维度(长度、宽度、高度)都有一条线。--]

However, Spatial IO is an extremely power-hungry feature, especially when trying to capture much larger spaces (up to 128x128x128). Having more spatial pylons included in the SCS around the desired volume will increase its overall &eefficiency&f, allowing it to use less energy to capture.[--然而,空间IO是一个极强的饥饿特性,特别是当试图捕获更大的空间(多达128x128x128)。拥有更多的空间塔将增加其整体&e效率&f,允许它减少使用能量来捕捉。--]

Also, be mindful that each individual pylon (regardless of its length) takes up one channel. For particularly large spaces, you may wish to build a dedicated network with a controller to fit all the required pylons.[--另外,请注意,每个塔(不管其长度如何)占用一个通道。对于特别大的空间,你可能希望建造一个带有控制器的专用网络,以适应所有所需的塔。--]
Spatial Cell Component[--空间单元组件--]

&bSpatial Storage Cells&f are used to hold one defined volume each, and come in three different capacities allowing for a maximum of 2x2x2, 16x16x16 and 128x128x128 blocks' worth of space.[--&b空间存储元件&f用于每个存储一个定义的体积,具有三种不同的容量,最多2x2x2、16x16x16和128x128x128x128的方块的空间值.--]

Upon encoding, a cell is allocated a section of space within the spatial storage &edimension&f, along with a unique ID corresponding to the region allocated to the cell. An encoded cell can still be used within the Spatial IO Port to retrieve any stored blocks and entities.[--编码后,一个单元在空间存储&edimension&f中分配了部分空间,同时有一个与分配到单元的区域相对应的唯一ID。一个编码的单元仍然可以在空间IO端口中用于取回任何存储的方块和实体。--]

From then on, any blocks contained either within the cell's region of space or in an SCS with the same size as the one used for the initial encoding can be moved back into the overworld or into the spatial dimension respectively. If there are blocks both within the spatial region and within the SCS, these will simply swap places accordingly.[--从那以后,任何包含在单元空间区域内的方块,或包含在SCS中的任何方块,其大小与初始编码中使用的方块相同,都可以分别移动回主世界或空间维度中。如果在空间区域内和在SCS中都有方块,则这些方块会相应地交换位置.--]
Spatial Storage Cell[--空间存储元件--]

The &bSpatial Anchor&f is a companion device from the Spatial IO lineage that simply functions as a chunk loader. When connected to an ME network, the Anchor will force-load all the chunks occupied by the ME network across all cables and devices, excluding subnetworks, as long as the network remains powered.[--&b空间锚&f是一个来自空间IOlineg的辅助设备,只是作为区块加载器。当连接到ME网络时,该锚将强制将ME网络占用的所有区块加载到所有电缆和装置中,排除子网络,只要网络保持供电。--]
The IO[--IO--]
OI, OI, OI![--OI,OI,OI!--]
To make life that much easier, AE2 provides a whole suite of devices for the manipulation of ME data, i.e. moving stored items around the world.[--为了让生活更加简单,AE2为ME数据提供全套操作设备,即将存储的物品移动到世界。--]

The &bME Interface&f is one of these devices. As an input device, the Interface allows any item/fluid/etc to be piped externally through it, which is then automatically stored in the ME Network that the interface is connected to.[--&bME接口&f是这些设备之一。作为输入设备,接口允许任何物品/流体/etc通过外部管道,然后自动存储在接口连接的ME网络中。--]

As an output device, the Interface can be configured to keep a certain available amount of a stored item in stock, from the ME network to its own internal inventory. This allows items to then be received by some external source like another player or some pipe.[--作为输出设备,接口可以配置为将一定数量的存储物品存储在库存中,从ME网络到自己的内部库存中。这允许一些外部来源,例如另一个玩家或一些管道接收物品。--]
ME Interface[--ME接口--]
Forgot to Mention[--忘记提一下--]
This has a use outside of crafting cables.[--除了制作线缆,这还可以使用.--]

An important concept within AE2 is a technique known as \"&esubnetting&f\", wherein an extra separate ME network (a &esubnetwork&f) acts in conjuction with the main network to perform some specialised function or process.[--AE2中的一个重要概念是被称为 \"&e子网络&f \" 的科技,其中有一个额外的单独的ME网络(a&e子网络&f)与主网络共鸣,以执行一些特定的功能或过程.--]

What separates a subnetwork from a completely detached separate network is usually the use of the &bQuartz Fiber&f as a cable part. When placed between two otherwise unconnected lengths of cable, the Quartz Fiber transfers no data or channels between the two whatsoever, instead only transmitting power.[--将子网络与完全分离的网络分离开来,通常是使用&b石英纤维&f作为线缆的一部分。当放置在两个否则没有连接的线缆之间时,石英纤维不传输任何数据或频道,而只是传输电力。--]

Thus, a subnetwork on the other side of the Fiber can be powered wholly by the main network's power source, without requiring any extra dedicated powergen.[--因此,纤维另一侧的子网络可以完全由主网络的电源供电,而不需要任何额外的专用电源。--]
P2P Tunnels[--P2P隧道--]
Cut out the middleman[--切换中继器--]

&bP2P&f (peer-to-peer) is a powerful system within AE2, allowing for the transfer of items, fluids and even more without the need for any intermediary ME storage.[--&bP2P&f(Peer-to-peer)是AE2的一个强大的系统,允许转移物品、流体甚至更多,而不需要任何中级ME存储.--]

Right-clicking on a P2P tunnel with certain items will &eattune&f the tunnel into one capable of transferring something else, such as items through pipes, energy through cables, redstone signals and (by default) even ME connections themselves.[--右键单击带有某些物品的P2P隧道会&eattune&f该隧道变成一个可以传输其他物品的隧道,例如通过管道传输物品,通过电缆提供能量,红石信号甚至(默认情况下)ME连接自己。--]
P2P tunnels must be linked to one another with the use of a &eMemory Card&f, detailed in the next quest.[--P2P通道必须使用&e记忆卡&f相互连接,在下一个任务中详细介绍。--]

The &bMemory Card&f is a tool with two different functions. The simplest of the two is to save various devices' configurations (such as whitelist filters) to be copied over to another device of the same kind.[--&b记忆卡&f是一种具有两种不同功能的工具。两种功能中最简单的是保存各种设备配置(例如白名单过滤器)以复制到另一个相同类型的设备。--]

The second function of a memory card is to link &eP2P tunnels&f together. When doing so, the P2P tunnel being linked will be assigned a unique ID, which is stored on the memory card for further linking.[--内存卡的第二个功能是将&eP2P隧道&f连接在一起。这样做时,连接的P2P隧道将被分配一个独特的ID,存储在内存卡上以进一步链接.--]
Memory Card[--存储卡--]
The... Weapons?[--武器?--]
Too hot for the ATF[--ATF太热了--]
These last three items are more or less some extra toys provided by AE2 and don't necessarily fit under any of these quest trees.[--这三件物品或多或少是AE2提供的一些额外的玩具,不一定适合任何这些任务树。--]

The &bCharged Staff&f is just a simple powered staff which deals 3 hearts of damage and consumes 300AE per hit. It also uses pre-1.9 combat mechanics, meaning that you can spam-click with this like in the good old days.[--&b充能法杖&f只是一个简单的充能法杖,每次击中会造成3颗心伤害并消耗300AE.它也使用1.9前战斗力,这意味着你可以像在前日一样用这个刷子单击.--]

The &bEntropy Manipulator&f, when &oused&r on certain blocks in the world, will smelt them in-place, such as sand to glass and metal ores to metal ingots. If not, it will simply light a fire on the block.[--&bEntropy Manipulator&f,当&oused&r在世界上某些方块上时,会将它们烧成正方形,例如沙子到玻璃,金属矿石到金属锭.如果不是,它会直接点燃方块的火.--]

Finally, the &bMatter Cannon&f functions similarly to the Color Applicator as a dedicated cell for holding \"ammo\" items such as Matter Balls and iron/gold nuggets, which can then be fired out to deal damage to mobs or break blocks. Heavier \"ammo\", e.g. metal nuggets, will deal more damage and destroy harder blocks.[--最后,&b物质加农炮&f与彩色充能器类似,是一个用于存储“弹药”物品(如物质球和铁/金粒)的单元,然后可以发射出去对生物造成伤害或破坏方块。例如金属粒,加维埃“弹药”将造成更多伤害并摧毁更坚硬的方块。--]

Matter Balls in a Matter Cannon can be substituted with &bPaint Balls&f, which will apply a paint splatter effect on the face of whatever block being fired at. &bLumen Paint Balls&f are a variant of paint balls exclusively used by the Matter Cannon, whose paint splatters also give off some light once present in the world.[--物质加农炮中的物质球可以用&b染色球&f替换,这将对被射向的任何方块的表面施加喷涂效果。&bLummen Pans Balls&f是物质加农炮专用的彩色球的变体,一旦物质加农炮存在,它的彩色喷溅也会发出一些光。--]
The O[--O--]

The &bME Export Bus&f periodically spits items in its whitelist filter out to whatever external storage the bus is facing. Unlike the Import Bus, the Export Bus cannot work without being filtered.[--&bME导出总线&f会将白名单过滤器中的物品定期吐出到总线面对的任何外部存储中。与输入总线不同,导出总线只有在被过滤的情况下才能工作.--]
GET OUT[--出去!--]

The &bME Formation Plane&f acts similarly to the Storage Bus, but treats the world itself as its storage medium. In other words, it will place down any block in its filter directly in front of itself.[--&bME成型飞机&f与存储总线相似,但将世界本身作为存储中继器。换句话说,它会直接将过滤器中的任何方块放置在它前面.--]
This can be useful for situations where a block can be processed simply by placing it and breaking it with a certain tool.[--这对一个方块可以通过放置它和用特定工具破坏它来进行处理的情况很有用。--]
The spare chest[--多余的箱子--]

The &bME Storage Bus&f, when facing some external storage container, will allow the container to be used as though it were part of the ME network, allowing items to be taken out from the container or inserted into it purely via ME.[--当面对一些外部存储容器时,&bME存储总线&f将允许容器像ME网络的一部分一样使用,允许物品从容器中取出或纯通过ME输入.--]

Storage buses can be filtered and given specific priorities such that specific items will try to go to the attached storage first, however it will not retroactively move any filtered items from anywhere else in the network to its attached storage.[--存储总线可以过滤,并给特定优先级,让特定物品先尝试前往连接的存储,但是它不会将任何过滤物品从网络的任何地方延展到其连接的存储。--]

The &bCapacity Card&f allows a bus upgraded with it to carry a larger filter. Import and Export buses upgraded with capacity cards can go from supporting only one filtered item each to their maximum nine-slot filter, while Storage buses will go from 18 slots to a maximum of 63.[--&b容量卡&f允许用它升级的总线携带更大的过滤器。用容量卡升级的总线可以从只支持1个过滤物品到最多9个插槽过滤器,而存储总线将从18个插槽到最多63个插槽。--]
Loosely Speaking[--轻而易举--]
The remaining two IO cards[--剩余两个IO卡片--]

The &bFuzzy Card&f allows a filtered item to be matched regardless of any (NBT) metadata such as damage or enchantments, while the &bInverter Card&f toggles the filter on such buses from being a whitelist to being a blacklist.[--&bFuzzy卡&f允许过滤的物品匹配任何(NBT)元数据,例如伤害或附魔,而&b反向卡&f则将这种总线上的过滤器从白名单切换为黑名单.--]
The I[--I--]

The &bME Import Bus&f periodically sucks items in from whatever external storage the bus is facing. It can optionally be filtered to only take in certain items from said inventory.[--&bME导入总线&f会从总线面前的外部存储器中不时抽取物品.它可以选择过滤器,只接收指定库存中的某些物品.--]
GET IN[--入门--]

The &bME Annihilation Plane&f can be used to automatically break any blocks in front of it and return anything dropped by the block directly to the ME network.[--&bME破坏飞机&f可以用来自动破坏它前面的任何方块,并将方块掉落的任何东西直接返还ME网络.--]

As an added bonus, the Annihilation Plane can be enchanted in the same way as a regular digging tool, affecting block drops in the same way as that enchanted tool would. This makes it ideal for processing ore blocks when enchanted with Fortune, for example.[--作为额外的奖励,破坏飞机可以像普通的挖掘工具一样附魔,对方块掉落物施加与附魔工具相同的效果。例如,当附魔时,它会更适合处理矿石块。--]

Any added enchantments significantly increase the amount of energy used by the plane every time a block is broken. Enchanting the plane with &eEfficiency&f will decrease the overall energy use incurred by all other enchantments, while the &eUnbreaking&f enchantment gives the plane the chance to only use any energy sometimes, similarly to Unbreaking on regular tools.[--任何添加的附魔都会在每次破坏方块时大幅提高飞机的能量消耗量。用&e效率&f给飞机附魔会减少其他所有附魔产生的总能量使用量,而&e破坏&f附魔会使飞机有几率偶尔使用任何能量,类似于在普通工具上不破坏.--]
